price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߗߋߣߍ߲߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߣߌ߲߬
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
